official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to extend the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into contracts to provide assistance payments and mortgage insurance under the homeownership assistance program for lower income families.

summary.text: Homeownership Assistance Act of 1983 - Amends the National Housing Act to extend the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into contracts to provide homeownership assistance payments and mortgage insurance for lower income families.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to extend the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into contracts to provide assistance payments and mortgage insurance under the homeownership assistance program for lower income families.
